code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MenuItem=_ref=>{let{id,title,description,imageName,price,quantity,updateQuantity}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/images/").concat(imageName),alt:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["$ ",price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-remove-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-primary",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(id,-1),children:"\u2796"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-primary",onClick:()=>updateQuantity(id,1),children:"\u2795"})]})]})]})]});};export default MenuItem;
